item.title: Vintage Porsche, Modern Safety
item.description:
...the slippery slope...

I wrote an article titled Vintage Porsche, Modern Safety for the July 2020 issue of The NOR'EASTER, a magazine written, edited, and published by the Northeast Region of the Porsche Club of America. You can read this article in the digital edition of the July 2020 issue …
item.dc:creator: Stephen DiCato

item.title: Attending Your First HPDE
item.description:
And so it begins...

I wrote an article titled Attending Your First HPDE (And so it begins...) for the June 2020 issue of The NOR'EASTER, a magazine written, edited, and published by the Northeast Region of the Porsche Club of America. You can read this article in the digital edition …
